data.title: Love the fresh food!
data.text:
I have eaten here many times during the last 3 or 4 years, and always love the food. Fresh and handmade Salads, Piadina's (made with handmade bread to die for), Pizza Soup, great fresh baked cookies/lemon bars, and the BEST potato salad I've ever had. I'm not a big potato salad fan either, especially in restaurants. 
My favorite place to go for lunch in the San Diego area. Small place with outside seating too. Kitchen is open so you can watch while they cook. 
My favorite dishes are Original Warm Chicken Salad, "Fig" Warm Chicken Salad, Piadina with chicken, provolone and pesto with side potato salad. For soup I've only had the Pizza Soup and it's rich and yummy! This is one of he vey few restaurants I love to get dessert...everything is delicious.

data.title: A great treat
data.text: We driving to meet a friend in Escondido and looked for a place that had salads. A quick search led us to Terry and this little gem. The space is small but lively. They gave great salads, piadinas and gluten-free sandwiches. The staff was warm and welcoming. Terry has a great story. Visit her and find out more.
